Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: papajacks
Reviews.Content: I like the camera very much, It was just what I needed, I would order again. I would recommend this camera to any who wanted A small good camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture quality
Reviews.Author: CMac
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. My parents bought it for me as a graduation present a couple years ago. It has great picture quality and is perfectly complemented by the 8gb HC(high clarity)high speed SD card I purchased. I would absolutely buy another if this one was damaged.

ProductInfo.Features:
Fujifilm FinePix T310 14 MP Digital Camera General Features: Black color
Super slim and compact design 14 megapixels Fujinon 10x optical zoom 6.7x digital zoom
3.0-inch TFT color LCD monitor (Approx. 230,000 dots)
SD/SDHC expansion card slot (supports up to 8 GB) 6 Scene SR Auto and detection functions
Easy to use Intelligent Shooting modes
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix T310 14MP 10x Optical 67x Digital Zoom HD Camera Black
